labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The message bar shows a solid line and the entire client freezes up.
data.expected_result: The message bar will show that you have reached the end of the line.
data.short_description: If you add too many spaces into the message box, the client freezes and becomes unresponsive
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold down your space-bar for 5 minutes
